CreateOrderAndPay.title: 购买图片并且支付订单

DescribeDownloadInfos.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ape.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeDownloadInfos
<公共请求参数>

{
   "ImageIds": [],
   "Offset": 0,
   "Limit": 2
}
DescribeDownloadInfos.title: 查询下载记录

DescribeImage.title: 查询图片详情

DescribeImages.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ape.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeImages
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Orientation": "horizontal", 
    "Keyword": "关键字", 
    "LayeredGalleryIds": [
        0
    ], 
    "Limit": 0, 
    "Offset": 0, 
    "ImageSenseType": "插画"
}
DescribeImages.title: 根据关键字搜索图片
